title: Book
content: This section contains the Book content and has been migrated under /wiki/book/. It is displayed as a collapsed section in the left navigation.

title: Quant
content: This section contains the Quant content and has been migrated under /wiki/quant/. It is displayed as a collapsed section in the left navigation.

title: Wiki
content:
Wiki#欢迎来到我的 Wiki 主页。使用左侧的导航菜单访问各个章节：Book 与 Quant 被设置为折叠（collapsed）节，Wiki 是一个独立的主页（点入即可查看内容）。
若需查看某章的子页面，请展开相应的折叠项。
